comments.body: I think it would be better to parameterize this, and call `${tmpdir}/kubelet` in tests instead of mocking with $PATH

It will be different execution codepath then (in test and in real function). This way it doesn't require from users of this function to add useless parameter every time somebody willing to utilize it. Testing with clean $PATH also allows to remove all possible interferences from host to exec().

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@	kubeletVersionRegex := regexp.MustCompile(`^\s*Kubernetes v((0|[1-9][0-9]*)\.(0|[1-9][0-9]*)\.(0|[1-9][0-9]*)([-0-9a-zA-Z_\.+]*)?)\s*$`)

	out, err := exec.Command("kubelet", "--version").Output()
	if err != nil {
		return nil, err
